name: Hiroshi Kamayatsu
description:
{{nihongo|'''Hiroshi "Monsieur" Kamayatsu'''|かまやつひろし|Hiroshi "Monsieur" Kamayatsu|extra=12 January 1939 – 1 March 2017}} was a Japanese singer and guitarist born in Tokyo.

He composed the music for ''[[Download (OVA)|Download]]'', a direct-to-video anime release based on PC Engine games.
